title: Build & Export
description: Learn how to build and export your visual novel project

steps.title: Build Settings
steps.content: Configure how your project is built and packaged for distribution.

steps.title: Select Platform
steps.content: Choose the target platform: Windows, macOS, Linux, Web, or mobile. Each platform has specific requirements.

steps.title: Build Options
steps.content: Configure resolution, window mode, compression settings, and other platform-specific options.

steps.title: Validate Project
steps.content: Click Validate to check for errors before building. This catches missing assets, broken links, and other issues.

steps.title: Start Build
steps.content: Click Build to start the build process. Progress and any warnings will appear in the console.

steps.title: Output Location
steps.content: The built project will be saved to this location. Click the folder icon to change the output directory.
